title: A Look At The Biggest Arms Exporter: The U.S.
teaser: Arms exports are a U.S. forte. We take a look at America's role in the world as the largest exporter of small arms.
contentencoded:
As a Ukrainian ceasefire remains fragile, former U.S. officials are calling for providing the Ukrainian military with light, shoulder-fired anti-armor missiles.

Arms exports are a U.S. forte. The United States is the biggest arms exporter in the world.

Matt Schroeder of the Geneva-based research group Small Arms Survey and co-author of the book The Small Arms Trade: A Beginner’s Guide, discusses this with Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson.

Guest

  • Matt Schroeder, senior researcher at the Geneva-based research group Small Arms Survey and co-author of the book “The Small Arms Trade: A Beginner’s Guide.”
